references.reason: This paper introduces the foundation of denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a crucial technology used in many modern text-to-image and text-to-3D generation models, including the model presented in this paper.

This is a seminal paper in text-to-3D generation that introduces the concept of using 2D diffusion models to guide 3D generation, providing a major advance in the field and directly inspiring methods used in this paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper details improvements to the quality and resolution of images generated with diffusion models, which are directly relevant to the high-quality texture generation addressed in this paper.

references.paper_title: Zero-1-to-3: Zero-shot one image to 3D object
references.reason: This paper offers a method for generating 3D objects from a single image, a technique directly relevant to the progressive geometry generation process described in this paper.

references.paper_title: NeuS: Learning neural implicit surfaces by volume rendering for multi-view reconstruction
references.reason: This paper presents a novel neural implicit surface representation that is used in the progressive geometry generation phase of the proposed method, improving the accuracy and detail of the 3D model.
